title: The punishment has started!
body:
First game (  http://www.twitch.tv/godofmasters5/ ) in progress

Zed (last pick) saying mid or afk. Locks in zed anyway. Top is revive teleport.

This is what you get for speaking out against lyte.

Doesn't matter that the last game I got 2 honors from my team and one from the other.

No I spoke out, I have to be punished. Come watch and see. Come watch lyte's lies dissolve like butter on a hot day.
